ISSUE.TITLE: Allow to extend GetListOfCampaignAllowedTokens and GetListOfAllowedTokens methods
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Right now a developer can add new tokens using EntityTokensAddedEvent or MessageTokensAddedEvent. But we should also allow them to extend GetListOfCampaignAllowedTokens and GetListOfAllowedTokens methods. And not by creation of a new class derived from MessageTokenProvider and further override of these methods. It should be done using events
